title: AIML - Sr Computational Linguist, Siri Conversational Intelligence
summary: The Siri Conversation Intelligence (SCI) team is creating groundbreaking technology for large scale systems, spoken language, machine learning, and LLMs to enable better conversational experience with Siri. The features we create are redefining how hundreds of millions of people use their computers and mobile devices to fulfill their requirements and find what they are looking for!
description: As part of the SCI team, you will work with the talent dense team who crafted the intelligent assistant that helps users get things done — just by asking. You will be responsible for doing research in the deep learning field and developing the most advanced natural language and conversation understanding systems. You should be passionate about working with software and platform engineers to integrate the models on-device and improve natural language understanding ability of Siri. Excellent interpersonal skills will be required to coordinate work across multiple teams to ship the state-of-the-art technology to production and impact all Siri users.
preferred_qualifications: Language Modeling: Develop and refine computational models for natural language understanding and generation, focusing on improving Siri's conversational abilities across various languages and domains. Data Analysis: Analyze large-scale datasets to identify patterns, trends, and linguistic phenomena, and leverage insights to enhance Siri's linguistic capabilities and user experience. Algorithm Development: Design and implement algorithms for speech recognition, language parsing, semantic analysis, and dialogue management, optimizing for accuracy, efficiency, and scalability. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams including engineers, designers, and product managers to integrate linguistic solutions into Siri's architecture and contribute to product development efforts. Research: Stay abreast of the latest advancements in computational linguistics, machine learning, and natural language processing, and apply cutting-edge techniques to drive innovation within the Siri ecosystem. Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough testing and evaluation of linguistic models and algorithms, iteratively refining performance and addressing any issues or discrepancies. Documentation and Communication: Document research findings, methodologies, and technical specifications comprehensively, and communicate effectively with stakeholders to ensure alignment and transparency.
